Subject: SAR Lessons
Description: Have you ever considered volunteering as an emergency responder, or are you simply curious about what happens in disaster areas when the 'official' help runs out?  An experienced former search and rescue (SAR) volunteer will share lessons learned about SAR operations, and perhaps a little about life.  Speakers include:Susan Sons - Track: Action Adventure  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none

Subject: Security Principles for Programmers
Description: A Senior Systems Analyst from the Center for Applied Cybersecurity Research will present a few basic information security principles and demonstrate how to apply them to programming of any kind.  Make your code less exploitable.  Speakers include:Susan Sons - Track: Tech  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none

Subject: BoF: Unsexy Code
Description: For people who write or want to learn to write infrastructure code, and boring but necessary tools of the trade for programmers and sysadmins.  It is not for game programmers or web designers or anybody who makes anything pretty.  We're all about making things work. Birds of a Feather events are unmoderated.  Speakers include:Susan Sons - Track: Tech  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none

Subject: Polyamory 201
Description: So, you've figured out that you should communicate, and you know what jealousy is.  What next?  Come together with those of us who have been at this a while and discuss some more advanced polyamory topics such as introducing new polyfolk into an established poly network, dealing with life changes within the poly network, trying the things we tell newbies not to try, and more.  Speakers include:Susan Sons, Adam Nuwer - Track: Life  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none

Subject: Security Principles for Systems Administrators
Description: A Senior Systems Analyst from the Center for Applied Cybersecurity Research will introduce a few principles that form the basis for most information security decisions, and demonstrate how they apply to everyday systems administration as well as system and network architecture decisions.  Make your environment less exploitable.  Speakers include:Susan Sons - Track: Tech  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none
